title: Very few issues being solved
body:
Is the reason for the lack of issues being solved due to lack of staff or just not giving a damn about peoples direct game problems?

I see a lot of problems with the game that are not being fixed but instead the focus is being put more on champions and ping issues etc.

I asked a support ticket one time why my teammates are always worse than the enemy and I got told some automated crap about some people have a bad game every now and then, I have approximately 3000+ games and for some reason I can't see multiple people having bad games in 99% of those games mostly on my team as an occasional thing.

Also why did i get dropped by approximately 1/4 of my mmr when I played provisionals and won 5/10?

I think someone forgot to turn off mmr decay for the preseason so everyone was decaying while ranked was locked. I have got myself out of bronze to silver 3 times now, so if I didn't have these bad teams or this mmr decay I calculated that I would be around diamond-challenger by now (instead of bronze 3). So you guys might want to get your stuff together because its impacting a lot of potential in the OCE scene.
